title: Honestly.. The one thing i like about the new Honor System..
body:
It makes you feel like you've accomplished something.

Like, It doesn't matter if you're like 0/6 toplane, When you get that honor, It makes you feel like you did something, Like the rest of the team was just worth much less and that they honored YOU because you're the least shitty person there..

Either that or they're super salt about the ADC being shit.

either way.
